name: LURIE CHILDREN'S HOSPITAL OF CHICAGO
sampleDescriptions: Support statutory reauthorization of the Children's Health Insurance and Medicaid reform issues generally; Medicaid issues affecting children's access to health care; support for Children's Health Ins
